headline: Study Aroad 2019 - Israel/Jordan
text: As a part of a Theology course through the University of St. Thomas, I spend the month of January in Israel and Jordan. I returned with a new perspective on cultures throughout the world and a new found ambition for more global travel!

headline: Summer 2019 - Internship
text: As of October 2018, I have accepted an internship for Summer 2019 at General Mills as an application developer. I am excited for the opportunity to work at such a well respected company.
